profile_summary:
As a Senior Performance Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging skills such as **C/C++**, **SIMD**, **AVX512**, and **LLVM** for compiler code generation and performance tuning. My expertise in concurrent programming and threading APIs enhances my ability to optimize applications for various CPU architectures. I am proficient in **Git** and **Mercurial**, which aids in efficient version control across both **Windows** and **Linux** environments.
Beyond performance engineering, I have a strong foundation in full-stack development, utilizing **Python**, **JavaScript**, and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. My comprehensive knowledge of cloud technologies including **Azure** and **AWS**, and experience in CI/CD automation enables me to execute rapid and reliable deployments. I possess significant experience in developing AI/ML pipelines and integrating MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, which further amplifies my capability to contribute to high-performance, scalable solutions.
